select record.*, surgery_tmp.info as surgeries, surgeon_tmp.info as surgeons, helper_tmp.info as helpers from record
left join (select record_id, group_concat(concat(name, ' / ', surgery.level, ' / ', price, ' 元')) as info from record_surgery left join surgery on record_surgery.surgery_id = surgery.id group by record_id) as surgery_tmp on surgery_tmp.record_id = record.id
left join (select record_id, group_concat(concat(name, ' / ',record_doctor.doctor_level, ' / ', doctor_score, ' 分')) as info from record_doctor left join doctor on record_doctor.doctor_id = doctor.id where doctor_type = '术者' group by record_id) as surgeon_tmp on surgeon_tmp.record_id = record.id
left join (select record_id, group_concat(concat(name, ' / ',record_doctor.doctor_level, ' / ', doctor_score, ' 分')) as info from record_doctor left join doctor on record_doctor.doctor_id = doctor.id where doctor_type = '助手' group by record_id) as helper_tmp on helper_tmp.record_id = record.id
history_num like concat('%', #{historyNum}, '%')
and name like concat('%', #{patientName}, '%')
and place like concat('%', #{place}, '%')
and date between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
and surgery_tmp.info like concat('%', #{surgeryName}, '%')
and surgeon_tmp.info like concat('%', #{surgeonName}, '%')
and helper_tmp.info like concat('%', #{helperName}, '%')
order by date desc
